sentences: manye ’vaner nanu gato ’py agataṁ hi bhāraṁ
yad yādavaṁ kulam aho aviṣahyam āste
stambasya vahnim iva śāntim upaimi dhāma
khaṁ vāyum agniṁ salilaṁ mahīṁ ca
yat kiṁ ca bhūtaṁ praṇamed ananyaḥ
naitan mano viśati vāg uta cakṣur ātmā
sattvaṁ rajas tama iti tri-vṛd ekam ādau
sūtraṁ mahān aham iti pravadanti jīvam
brahmaiva bhāti sad asac ca tayoḥ paraṁ yat
prāṇo hi jīvam upadhāvati tatra tatra
jñānaṁ svataḥ śvasanato balam oja īhā
mā bhair vibho madana māruta deva-vadhvo
gṛhṇīta no balim aśūnyam imaṁ kurudhvam
svauko vilaṅghya paramaṁ vrajatāṁ padaṁ te
dhatte padaṁ tvam avitā yadi vighna-mūrdhni
krodhasya yānti viphalasya vaśaṁ pade gor
dattaḥ kumāra ṛṣabho bhagavān pitā naḥ
bhūtvātha vāmana imām aharad baleḥ kṣmāṁ
nityā hi jantor na hi tatra codanā
na kiṅkaro nāyam ṛṇī ca rājan
naitair bhavān ajita karmabhir ajyate vai
śuddhir nṛṇāṁ na tu tatheḍya durāśayānāṁ
padaḥ punātu bhagavan bhajatām aghaṁ naḥ
nasy ota-gāva iva yasya vaśe bhavanti
tat tasthūṣaś ca jagataś ca bhavān adhīśo
arthāñ juṣann api hṛṣīka-pate na lipto
ye ’nye svataḥ parihṛtād api bibhyati sma
tat tv añjasā nigaditaṁ bhavatā yathāhaṁ
na veda kiñcid bahir antaraṁ vā
tūrṇaṁ yateta na pated anu-mṛtyu yāvan
ātmānam anyaṁ ca sa veda vidvān
yasyāṁ na me pāvanam aṅga karma
vandhyāṁ giraṁ tāṁ bibhṛyān na dhīraḥ
tathaiva me vyaktir iyaṁ hi vāṇī
ghrāṇo raso dṛk sparśaḥ śrutiś ca
tyaktaṁ bhramāya na bhavet smṛtir ā-nipātāt
dehaṁ ca naśvaram avasthitam utthitaṁ vā
yan nairapekṣyaṁ na viduḥ sukhaṁ mama
dhmātaṁ punaḥ svaṁ bhajate ca rūpam
yāḥ kāś ca bhūmau divi vai rasāyāṁ
na hy ete yasya santy aṅga
janmādayo ’sya yad amī tava tasya kiṁ syur
ādy-antayor yad asato ’sti tad eva madhye
pumān bhavābdhiṁ na taret sa ātma-hā
dṛg rūpam ārkaṁ vapur atra randhre
ātmā yad eṣām aparo ya ādyaḥ
yuñjyād vaśe taṁ sa hi deva-devaḥ
kim ātmanaś cātra hi bhaumayos tat
na hy ātmano ’nyad yadi tan mṛṣā syāt
krudhyeta kasmān na sukhaṁ na duḥkham
krudhyeta kasmai na hi karma mūlam
nāgner hi tāpo na himasya tat syāt
sa vai madhyaṁ ca tasya san
kālaś ca hetuś ca tad eva madhye
na yat purastād uta yan na paścān
bhūtaṁ prasiddhaṁ ca pareṇa yad yat
tad eva tat syād iti me manīṣā
devā hy asur vāyur jalam hutāśaḥ
tamo nihanyān na tu sad vidhatte
ko vā bhajet kim api vismṛtaye ’nu bhūtyai
kiṁ vā bhaven na tava pāda-rajo-juṣāṁ naḥ
pratyākraṣṭuṁ nayanam abalā yatra lagnaṁ na śekuḥ
karṇāviṣṭaṁ na sarati tato yat satām ātma-lagnam
yac-chrīr vācāṁ janayati ratiṁ kiṁ nu mānaṁ kavīnāṁ
dṛṣṭvā jiṣṇor yudhi ratha-gataṁ yac ca tat-sāmyam īyuḥ
nyahan śarair dadbhir iva dvipā vane
jñātīṁs tv ahan jñātaya eva mūḍhāḥ
kiṁ tasya te vayam asad-gatayo gṛṇīmaḥ
diśo na jāne na labhe ca śāntiṁ
kiṁ svāvane svar anayan mṛgayuṁ sa-deham
anyatra ceha ca śrutāni gṛṇan manuṣyo
ātmānam anyaṁ ca sa veda vidvān
yasyāṁ na me pāvanam aṅga karma
vandhyāṁ giraṁ tāṁ bibhṛyān na dhīraḥ
